page.title: 04Events the Carnival
page.content: Weeks before the carnival the organizers are busy writing away in books thinking about what to do.A day before the carnival all the lorries are waiting gathered in a car park.On route there are decorations,bunting hanging over the lamposts.Some people dress up as pirates and some dress up as clowns. All the barriers are up and ready,Children get on the floats and we all get started.The first lorry goes and then a couple of minutes later another one goes.On route mothers and fathers take thousands of pictures to put in their albums.There are hot dog and ice cream vans. When it is all over people take down the barriers and a lot or litter is left to blow away."Next year,"the organizers keep muttering"We'll plan a way to control the litter."
